thread.title: BU men's basketball to have 2 conference games on ESPN3
thread.title_full: BU men's basketball to have 2 conference games on ESPN3

title: BU men's basketball to have 2 conference games on ESPN3
text:
BU men's basketball to have 2 conference games on ESPN3 The America East Conference released it's ESPN television schedule for the 2015-16 athletic calendar. Post to Facebook BU men's basketball to have 2 conference games on ESPN3 The America East Conference released it's ESPN television schedule for the 2015-16 athletic calendar. Check out this story on pressconnects.com: http://press.sn/1LkI23P Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation BU Bearcats Lynn Worthy, lworthy@pressconnects.com | @PSBLynn 6:06 p.m. EDT October 8, 2015 
The Binghamton University men's basketball team will play two America East Conference games broadcast on ESPN3 this winter. The conference released it's broadcast schedule on Thursday. The schedule includes 19 regular-season basketball games and 14 postseason contests between the conference's men's and women's teams. 
The Bearcats will have both their home games against in-state rivals Stony Brook University and the University at Albany broadcast on ESPN3. The Bearcats host Stony Brook in the conference opener for both teams on January 6. They'll host three-time defending conference tournament champion UAlbany on February 8. 
ESPN's family of networks will also carry the entire men's and women's basketball postseason, including the men's championship game on ESPN2 on March 12. 
ESPN's networks will also carry conference championship games in field hockey, men's soccer, men's lacrosse and women's lacrosse. Read or Share this story: http://press.sn/1LkI23P Most Popular
